name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Call of Duty Ghost Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser into Call of Duty Ghosts! Download now for intense live wallpapers and a game-inspired new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser into the world of Call of Duty Ghosts! Download now for intense live wallpapers and a game-inspired new tab experience.

Step into the shadows with the Call of Duty Ghost Live Wallpaper Chrome extension! Every new tab brings you closer to the action, with dynamic wallpapers featuring iconic moments from Call of Duty Ghosts, showcasing your favorite Ghosts and epic in-game scenes.

Key Features:
Dynamic Ghosts Live Wallpaper: Relive intense action from Call of Duty Ghosts with stunning, animated wallpapers.
Clock & Date Display: Stay organized while immersed in your gaming world with a stylish clock and date layout.
Quick Access Links: Instantly access your favorite websites, making your browsing experience more convenient.
Convenient Options: Discover more extensions, check the privacy policy, or uninstall with just a click.

Designed for fans of Call of Duty Ghosts, this extension transforms your new tab into an action-packed, immersive environment.

Download now and dive into the world of Ghosts with every new tab!
